name: Pad Thai Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Put this Better Than Takeout favourite on the menu when you’re in the mood for a lazy dinner. With our Pad Thai blend, we’ve done the hard work for you! Just mix it with hot water and soy sauce, and you will get the perfect Pad Thai taste every time. Cook it up with chicken or shrimp, noodles, and veggies, and dinner is ready in less than 20 minutes for $3/serving.
